metadata.title: CVE-2024-24680 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Potential denial-of-service in intcomma template filter

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-24680` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-django - 2:2.2.12-1ubuntu0.21
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:2.2.12-1ubuntu0.21').
